title: Honey Garlic Wings
description: Sticky and flavorful chicken wings with a sweet honey-garlic glaze.
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Arrange chicken wings on a baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes.
In a saucepan, mix honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, and olive oil. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Coat the wings with the glaze and bake for another 10 minutes.

title: Hot Wings
description: Spicy chicken wings coated in a tangy hot sauce glaze.
steps: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
Arrange chicken wings on a baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes.
In a saucepan, combine hot sauce, butter, vinegar, and garlic powder. Heat until melted and combined.
Toss the wings in the sauce and bake for another 10 minutes.

title: Marinated Wine and Thyme Steak
description: A tender steak marinated in red wine and thyme for a flavorful main course.
steps: Place the steak in a shallow dish and pour the red wine over it.
Add thyme, black pepper, and salt. Marinate in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours.
Remove the steak from the marinade and cook to your desired doneness.

title: Brown Sugar Carrots
description: Sweet and tender carrots glazed with brown sugar and butter.
steps: Boil the carrots until tender and drain.
In a skillet, melt butter and stir in the brown sugar and salt.
Add the carrots and toss until glazed.

title: Currant Irish Soda Bread
description: A traditional Irish bread made with baking soda, buttermilk, and sweet currants.
steps: Preheat the oven to 325°F.
Mix all dry ingredients, flour, baking soda, baking powder, and salt in a large bowl.
Slowly add buttermilk and knead until a dough forms. Knead 10 times.
Shape the dough into a round loaf and bake, place on ungreased and floured cookie sheet, 40–45 minutes.
Pull out of oven 2 times and glaze with brush using water and sugar that was boiled.

title: No-crust Spinach and Egg Quiche
description: A savory quiche with spinach, protein rich cheese, and fluffy eggs.
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F
Grate the carrot & chop the mushrooms, or any other vegetable you want to prepare
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, heavy cream, salt, pepper and vegetables
Mix the chopped spinach and shredded cheese in with everything else.
Bake for 60 minutes or until the quiche is set and golden brown.

title: Rolled Omelette
description: A tamago-style omelette with layers of egg rolled with ingredients inside.
steps: Crack and beat the eggs in a bowl. Add the heavy cream and mix until smooth.
Preheat a small to medium-sized pan over medium-high heat. Once hot, add oil or butter to coat the pan.
Pour a thin layer of the egg mixture into the pan and cook until it sets, like a pancake.
Use a spatula to lift one side of the egg and roll it over gently, about 1 cm at a time, creating a crepe-like roll.
Shift the rolled egg to one side of the pan and pour in an additional layer of egg mixture.
Place a small amount of the chopped onion and shredded cheese along the edge where the new layer meets the rolled egg.
Repeat the rolling and layering process until all the whisked egg mixture and ingredients are used up.

title: Chamomile Tea
description: Single serving of soothing flowery mint chamomile tea
steps: add boiling water to flowers in kettle or tea strainer
steep flowers for approx. 10 minutes

title: Grilled Tofu
description: Charred tofu grilled on the barbeque with a salty and umami sauce
steps: Compress the tofu block with 2 plates and a weight to squeeze out the liquid.
Slice into strips.
Prepare the sauce.
Chop garlic & ginger.
Add soya sauce, rice vinegar, lemon juice, and chopped ingredients to a bowl.
Dip slices of tofu into the sauce.
Grill on medium-high for 7 minutes on each side.
Brush on sauce while cooking.

title: Beet Mint Juice
steps: add chopped mint to beet juice
warm honey in microwave and stir in

title: Beef Vindaloo
description: Spicy & red with tender beef serving 3 (rice extra)
steps: Use a mortar and pestle grind the cloves and fennel seeds
Dice onions, tomato, and mince garlic and ginger
Sautee in olive oil the onions, tomatoes, garlic, and ginger for 5 minutes
Add the coconut milk, tomato paste, wine, and all the spices
Chop steak in chunks
Add in steak
Simmer till beef is cooked (~15 minutes on low-medium) and red color has darkened
Salt to taste and squeeze in lime
Garnish with chopped corriander

title: Porcini Risotto
description: Savoury mushroom and white wine risotto, where nutrition facts are for full recipe.
steps: Rinse and hydrate the porcini mushrooms with water and add to chicken broth in heated pot
Chop and sautee the onions and leeks in some butter
Add the rice to the vegetables in a deep dish pan
Add white wine to ingredients in pan and stir and wait a couple minutes
Every 5 minutes, laddle chicken broth into and stir enough to distribute evenly until rice is al dente
Add remainaing amount of butter and half of parmesan cheese
Garnish with chopped parsley and parmesan

title: Vegetarian Šunkofleky
description: Fluffy and cheesey without pork, served with a side of sauerkraut and pickles, where nutrition facts are for full recipe.
steps: Preheat oven to 400°F
Cook egg noodles in boiling water
Slice fennel in strips and sautee
Beat the eggs and add the milk
Use a mortar and pestle to grind the cloves and add to the mix
Slice mushroom in strips add to mix
Add capers, mustard, and minced garlic
Coat the dish pan with butter and breadcrumbs and add mix to dish and place in oven for 40 minutes
Garnish with chopped basil and shredded cheddar and put in oven for another 5 minutes
Serve with sauerkraut and pickles

title: Festive Turkey & Stuffing
description: Traditional turkey with homemade stuffing featuring brioche, seasonal vegetables, and dried cranberries
steps: Break up bread in large bowl
Sauté vegetables in butter until soft
Add peeled and large diced apples midway cooking vegetables, sauté 5 more minutes
Add cranberries and parsley
Stir vegetables into bread
Beat eggs and mix into bread mixture
Stuff into clean (inside and outside) and dry turkey cavity
Preheat oven to 425°F
Season outside turkey with salt and pepper
Add water to bottom of turkey pan
Place turkey upside down because gravity of juices makes the turkey breasts beautiful
Cook at 425°F for 15-20 minutes
Reduce heat to 350°F and cook 3.5-4.5 hours depending on turkey size

title: Aloe Mango Smoothie
description: Refreshing smoothie combining fresh aloe vera, sweet alphonso mangos, and oat milk
steps: Separate aloe from skin with knife and chop into pieces
Slice mangos and remove skin
Place all ingredients in blender
Pulse until smooth

title: Layered Apple Cake
description: A delicious layered cake with fresh apples, cinnamon, and a tender butter base
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F
In a large bowl, mix together 2/3 cup sugar, flour, baking powder, and salt
Add well beaten eggs and oil to the dry mixture, stir until combined, and set aside
Peel and slice apples into thin slices
In a separate bowl, combine apples with 1/4 cup sugar and cinnamon
Grease an 8x8 inch glass baking dish
Spread half of the batter evenly in the prepared dish
Layer half of the sliced apples over the batter
Repeat with remaining batter and apples
Sprinkle chopped walnuts over the top layer
Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick inserted comes out clean
